type.name: org.gradle.tooling.connection.GradleConnectionBuilder.ParticipantBuilder
type.description: Builds a new participant that will be included in the connection.

method.name: useBuildDistribution
method.description:
Specifies the Gradle distribution described in the build should be used.

returns:this

method.name: useDistribution
method.description:
Specifies the Gradle distribution to use.
param:gradleDistribution The distribution to use.

returns:this

method.name: useGradleVersion
method.description:
Specifies the version of Gradle to use.
param:gradleVersion The version to use.

returns:this

method.name: useInstallation
method.description:
Specifies the Gradle distribution to use.
param:gradleHome The Gradle installation directory.

returns:this
